title: What methods do Facebook, Twitter, and other social networks use to monitor information posted on their websites? Specifically, the designation and discovery of illicit, innappropriate content. - Quora

response.answer_text: Many rely a lot on users reporting this kind of contents.On more protected networks e.g. for children bad word filters are used that won't allow to post certain words.
for filtering out the profanity (bad words) you can use WebCensor browser extensions: http://webcensorapp.com/ . To filter out nude pics for example, hmm, it's gonna be harder.
